website_summaries.verdict: The V-Moda Remix Remote headphones earn our Editors' Choice recommendation with a colorfully dynamic sound profile, a generous two-year replacement warranty, and a handful of accessories that ensure a tight seal and versatile usability.
pros: Durable metal housing, a Kevlar-braided cable, a two-year warranty, and a generous frequency range give the V-Moda Remix Remote earbuds an edge over the competition
cons: These are stunning headphones inside and out, but they're stylistically reserved compared with the glitz of other flashy, modern designs

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome .... Great sound out of the box , feel great, look great (red) and the ear clips work great at stopping cord noise ... I am comparing these to the the klipsch s4i , monster beats tour, and Bose in ear mobile headphones (I also own all of these so it is not just a quick in store check) and the sound is by far better than all of those .... Not sure why vmoda went away from the cloth cable back to rubber (maybe to decrease noise) ... But overall a great set of earbuds ! Thanks vmoda
customer_reviews.author: Vik Mehta

customer_reviews.title: Very small. Smaller than I thought but still love the product.
customer_reviews.text: Very small. Smaller than I thought but still love the product. These are better that some etymotic and harman kardon ear buds I purchased in the past. Im not into heavy bass and prefer clear mid and high ranges like vocals and pop but it has enough bass to enjoy my dubstep. The silicone ear piece (small) fits perfectly in my ear and comfortably without popping out during my gym, mountain biking, or running workouts. If you wet the silicone ear piece just enough to create a suction type seal so you can isolate 100% of the outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: ThisGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very good buds!
customer_reviews.text: I use these on the go, run 5 miles a day with them in my ears and they stay put! Tuned for awesome sound and rockin tunes to keep me going and in call they perform just as well. I get calls frequently while I am running and never a complaint of not being heard clearly on the call. So if you want to hear your music very well and have a great headset for calls as well, buy these buds and you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Best phones I've ever found
customer_reviews.text: These phones pass the Multimedia Speaker Test ( with flying colors, and they pass the Nero test as well. Bass has a great kick, and the entire sound is clean and crisp. Highly recommended. CAVEAT: These are terrible for working out. They are heavy and don't stay in my ears for more than 30 seconds. Stationary listening only.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Disliked sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Some one recommended these. I put them on and gave it ten minutes and put them back into the box. Bose headsets might break but the sound quality of Bose bets this junky head set. To much money and the are crappie headset. I don't recommend spending the money on these. I recommend Bose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use them everyday
customer_reviews.text: I have used these headphones for awhile, through rain and the wash machine they are still going. I use them every day at work and they sound great. I like Apple's new headphones but these are still good for noise canceling situations (which I need alot of at work). A great price, buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Really amazing earbuds, they have better sound quality than my ...
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing earbuds, they have better sound quality than my friend sony X headphones which cost like $150, dunno, why these earbuds are over $100 now, on the v-moda website they are $70 which is what I paid for them. They have amazingly deep bass, crisp clear highs, and even when I crank up the bass all the way the bass does not muddy out any other sound. I love the high quality durable built too. They are full metal, lightweight too, must be some sort of alloy. The cable is Kevlar, but its coated in a layer of a soft rubbery material.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Forsberg

customer_reviews.title: Super deep and quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Super deep and quality sound. If you are looking for a deep and clear sound, these are the headphones. They've got a very nice, deep and clear bass. It's truly noise isolating. You can't hear anything what is going on around you. I love these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Gorrin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bass
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 pairs of different level Sure and 2 pairs of Klipsch headphones and was looking to try something different but still in the sub $100 category. I like the bass level and clarity with the V-Moda, curious to see how they sound in 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Kurt P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: All Headphones Not Created Equal
customer_reviews.text: As the title suggests, before buying these headphones I figured there really was no difference between headsets. But really this headset is amazing. Great sound quality, I got these to replace the standard headphones that came with my iphone, I heard sounds in my music I didnt even know were there. I will say i cant really comment on the "kevlar reinforced cord" they really just seem like regular rubber coated cables, but great quality none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and good fit
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and good fit. Bass is strong and the convenient.inline volume and pause buttons work well on an iPod. Kind of wish they used a cloth cord cover but tangling isn't really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burge

customer_reviews.title: I feel cool
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headphones. Fit in my ears perfectly thanks to the many size options. I always have trouble with ear buds but these work great. Looks cool and I recommended them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Khan

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I carry headphone everywhere I go. I use them while hiking, running, biking, doing dishes, etc. I have destroyed many. These are rock solid and sound great. The remote works perfectly. Would buy a second pair if they break but I don't expect that to happen anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wired headphones. Most durable ones I've bought, and I'm really rough on headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever owned. Sturdy and extremely well made unlike the many Skullcandy headphones I've previously had to purchase due to poor craftsmanship. And the sound is almost as good as Bose headphones. I highly recommend these at their price.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B. Shull

customer_reviews.title: Vmoda headphone
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but I like Bose and the sound is better on the Bose, v moda has a good base, good quality building
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Im

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great build quality
customer_reviews.text: I just love the sound they produce, its full, well balanced, the basses are not overpowered but they are definitely there. Great build quality as well. one thing i must state is that the location of the mic makes it a bit difficult for others to hear me. maybe it should have been made a bit more sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: W.h

customer_reviews.title: Pure Sound
customer_reviews.text: The most pure sound I ever hered. Only one thing the earbuds that comes are awfull but the secound that came outside the box were the coolest thing
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Alonso Holmstron

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.text: VModa makes the best headphones with the best, and I mean BEST, warranty and support policy in the headphone industry.
customer_reviews.author: Ninjahippies

customer_reviews.title: 110% Satisfied w/ these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently deployed and needed headphones that would stand-up to harsh climates as well as the harshness of performing physical fitness. I researched headphones for about 2 months and settled on these. Wow! to sum it up in one word, these headphones are spectacular. I've had them for about 1 month now, use them daily for walking and gym time and have withstood the abuse that I've placed them through. In addition, the sound is outstanding. There are no pop or fizzes with these and the high's mid are clear and crisp. The bass feels like I have my own perssonal subwoofers in my head. I'm definitly glad I went with these headphones after wasting money on 4 previous pair.
customer_reviews.author: David W. King

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: i am not sure why some people don't like it, i think it is one of the best headphones i ever had, and belive me with my long commute and travling around the globe alot, i use alot of headphones :) this one is so good and the mic and the remote control work just perfect
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound extremely amazing!! they have perfect mids, great highs, and clear lows. they are some of the best i have ever used in my life and I'm very satisfied with them! they are a perfect comfortable fit and they sound crisp clear. Great bass too!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Ive always been impressed my V-Moda headphones. This was the first in ear headphones from them and im still in love with the quality and sound from them.
customer_reviews.author: Raziel

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These broke the first time they got tugged on, I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: michael zeiger

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds have incredible sound quality as well as good dynamic design built for earlobes. A great buy for the price given!!
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and well-built product! Received it very quick, just as advertised. Works well with iPhone, so far I haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: George F Vidal Jr

customer_reviews.title: These rock! Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for most music great bass for hip-hop or rock. I use them for running but I don't see how you could use the ear clip thing the cord is way to short.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Good Pair
customer_reviews.text: These are nice headphones and they are unexpectedly strong and they have really good sound and bass. And they are pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Graham

customer_reviews.title: they are broken already
customer_reviews.text: would never buy them again, they stop working with in 5days. The sound is good when it did work. just need to return them
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Landry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am using V-Moda Crossfade Lp2 and I am really happy with that. But this model is such a disappointing. There was no sound at all on the left side after a couple of usage. I feel like I throwed 60 dollars to street..
customer_reviews.author: NtxivNeej

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a year!
customer_reviews.text: Really, they didn't last 8 months, but it's taken me a while to get to writing a review. They do have multiple sized rubber inserts to add to the comfort, but the little bag they come in offer no protection en route. The sound quality is good until the earbuds become unglued and they start rattling around in your ears, then finally go out all together. I use headphones everyday at the gym and even at night to block out sounds and help me go to sleep. If you're a daily/nightly user of headphones, I would steer clear of these, they definitely won't hold up to the rigor.
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Doe not work for iPhone 3GS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this twice on amazon and the volume controls and stop/play button doesn't work! Thank god for amazon's easy return policies! However the audio quality of the ear buds are very good! I'd love to keep them if they worked.
customer_reviews.author: NeutronElf

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 months time
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these headphones. I have only used them about 2 months and the tip of the plug broke off inside of a headphone extension cord. That is $40 plus down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: MicRella

customer_reviews.title: Ok hphones, poor support, and lot of cable noise
customer_reviews.text: ordered these because i wanted the 3 buttons, Fits well, looks ok comes with a lot of different size ear things so thats nice. I get shocked every once in a while in my right ear from the headphone, the company says it happens sometimes and they can replace it if i mail them my headphones and pay for shipping. Not a fan of that Also, any movement or brushing of the wire causes a lot of noise. Sound is ok. decent base and treb, still testing and tweaking to see how well ti works.
customer_reviews.author: SpencerC

customer_reviews.title: Actually, it pays to read the reviews before buying anything on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Other V-Moda products are excellent but these..... junk!! They are made very well, look great but the sound is horrible!! The range of sound in minimal. I should have 'listened' to the reviews before the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Temple

customer_reviews.title: very tinny sounding no base
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound do not waste your money tinny sound I have better ear buds for half the price would love to get money back
customer_reviews.author: John Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Failed in less than a year!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones looked very stylish, and I got them based on good reviews, but I'm very disappointed that in less than a year, the sound from these headphones has fallen to a very low level.
customer_reviews.author: Prasad Chalasani

customer_reviews.title: NO Bass
customer_reviews.text: I bought these V Moda earbuds because the previous pair I owned finally gave up which were also V Moda. I absoutly loved my originals which is why I thought i'd buy another pair but I am very disappointed at these Remix Remote pair. They have absolutely no bass and no settings on my iPhone can change that. The mid's and high's sound clear but NO Bass. I'm returning these things ASAP and hopefully find some buds with much better sound...
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with these headphones. I finally got them today. I pull the headphones out of the packaging and the right headphone does not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One half worked fine!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this remote Headset just before my resent trip. It worked fine for three days ... then on side quit! I spent my trip listening with one ear!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie

product_meta.title: V-MODA Remix Remote In-Ear Noise-Isolating Metal Headphone with 3-Button Apple Control (Chrome)
product_meta.description:
Color:Chrome| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingDesigned for ultimate durability, unparalleled audio clarity and absolute affordability, Remix Remote is a testament to V-MODA’s passionate dedication to the development of sound and precise construction for even the most discerning audiophile. From the redefined driver to the restructured soft silicone fittings designed to enhance audio performance, consumers will enjoy a unique and distinct listening experience with the perfect balance of rich bass and high-definition audio clarity. The all-metal construction, Kevlar-reinforced cables and commitment to quality is backed by a two-year premium warranty and V-MODA’s "No Questions Asked" 50 percent off product replacement guarantee.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Don't just hear the music, feel it. With the Remix Remote, you get unparalleled sound clarity and vibrant bass putting you in every song. Plus, you get control at your fingertips with the integrated three-button remote and high fidelity microphone. Combining all-metal craftsmanship with fashion-forward design, the Remix Remote is lightweight and durable, perfect for the mobile lifestyle.



Unparalleled Control and Sound
A three-button remote and high fidelity, omni-directional microphone let you control the music playback, volume or Voice Control functions with ease. A newly tuned 9mm V-MASQUE high definition dynamic driver creates the absolute in clarity and the perfect balance of vibrant bass built in collaboration with pro musicians and DJs. The BEATPORT air flow system delivers a high-definition soundstage, invoking the sense of a live music or club experience. V-MODA's revered BLISS (Bass Level Isolating Soft Silicone) noise-isolating technology further reduces outside noise and enables deep punchy bass for the ultimate audio experience. Universal Compatibility
Featuring a three-button remote and discrete omni-directional microphone, the Remix Remote gives you complete control of an iPhone 3GS or supported iPod. You can play, pause, raise or lower the volume of your music with the touch of a button. You can even record voice memos and utilize Apple Voice Control. Of course, you can listen to music with any iPod. In fact, any mp3 player with a 3.5mm input will work with the Remix Remote.



Kevlar core for serious durability. 
Click to enlarge. 

What about other phones? You can use the high-fidelity microphone and control button to talk all you want with your favorite phone, provided it has a 3.5mm jack.

Want to use the Remix Remote with your Mac? You can, it's compatible with the latest Mac products, including the iMac, Mac Pro, MacBook or MacBook Pro and can be used for iChat, iTunes, Skype, VoIP, and other audio recording applications.

Ultimate Ergonomic Comfort
Your headphones are supposed to be comfortable. With rigorous ergonomic research and development, the Remix Remote gives you an incredible fit for the ultimate music experience. The newly designed medical-grade soft silicone ear tips come in four sizes and are designed for a comfortable and secure fit. For the active lifestyle, the detachable sport earhooks feature patent pending Active Flex technology for maximum stability. 

Built to Last
We're passionate about sound and providing you a durable product. We've spent years of diligent engineering to insure Remix Remote is multiple times stronger than many headphones sold within the same price range. Each component was dissected and analyzed by a team of seasoned engineers to create a high-quality headphone that could withstand the extended use by V-MODA's dedicated listeners. With the dual functionality of today's headphones as headsets, it is paramount that the cable and plug are as precisely engineered as the ear buds. Special attention was given to a custom cable construction comprised of a strong Kevlar core to relieve tension and a uniquely braided copper material that is specially designed to increase flex during use. The gold-plated plug and stainless steel core feature a 45-degree extended strain relief to withstand stress.

What It Means to be a "Lifestyle" Headphone
At the gym, heading to the venue, or walking down the street, the Remix Remote is designed for your mobile lifestyle. Weighing only 17 grams, they are lightweight for comfort. Featuring all-metal construction, the Remix Remote combines sleek design and durability. The patent pending detachable sport earhooks insure you don't miss a beat, even when you're on the go. With the Remix Remote, the pinnacle experience of music is interwoven with supreme style in these premium fashion-phones that sound as amazing as they look. 

We put years of extra thought and research into the cable. Why is the cable so important? The main cable diameter of 2.2mm and overall cord length of 44"-46" work best to prevent "earphone fallout". V-MODA's cables are rigorously tested with weights to withstand abuse.


If you're rough on your headphones, don't worry. We've designed a replacement program just for you. With the exclusive V-MODA Replay Replacement Program, you get a 50% off lifetime replacement guarantee. Of course, that is in addition to the two-year V-MODA premier warranty. 

What's in the Box
V-MODA Remix Remote headphones, four pairs of clear ear tips and four pairs of black ear tips (XS,S,M,L), patent pending detachable sport earhooks with Active Flex technology, and a premium carrying pouch for easy storage. Each Remix Remote comes with the two-year V-MODA premier warranty and exclusive Replay Replacement Program--50% off lifetime replacement guarantee.
feature_bullets: High-definition, full-range sound with metal construction, custom designed Kevlar reinforced cable, and 45 degree plug for rock solid durability
Three-button remote and omnidirectional mic allow you to adjust volume, control your music, record voice memos and answer calls
Voice/music control of iPhone 3GS, iPod shuffle 3G, iPod touch 2G, iPod nano 4G, 120GB iPod classic, as well as MacBook, MacBook Pro, iMac and Mac Pro (2009 and newer models)
24k gold-plated plug fits all iPod models, MP3 players and devices with 3.5mm jack
Ergonomically designed soft, silicone fittings and detachable clip/earhooks for comfort and stability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars188 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
